description: The most exciting company in media sells a card game » Nieman Journalism Lab
extended: Cards Against Humanity will remain the most exciting company in media. I’m watching them experiment on Twitch and with podcasts and live events in a way that gets people excited, builds a fan base and community, and makes people more invested in their own communities.

description: Can you be a feminist and like rough sex?
extended: Slapping, choking, spitting — if a woman gets off on a little consensual degradation in the bedroom, does that make her less of a feminist?

description: Does anybody really smoke in combat? [Archive] - Straight Dope Message Board
extended: View Full Version : Does anybody really smoke in combat? I've seen several where the instructor warns the recruits NOT to smoke because it will give them away. Not so much the smell of smoke as the lit tip eaqsily visible at night.

description: This Is How Hillary Clinton Gets the Coverage She Wants
extended: Hillary Clinton’s supporters often argue that mainstream political reporters are incapable of covering her positively—or even fairly.

description: Thursday’s massive gravitational wave news was broken by a sheet cake (really) - The Washington Post
extended: In case you live under a rock, there's been some huge news in the physics world: On Thursday, scientists finally confirmed long-swirling rumors that they'd detected gravitational waves for the first time. But we heard it first from a picture of a cake.

description: WHEN THERE IS NO TEMPLATE, Writing on Pixar’s INSIDE OUT — Medium
extended: My first day working at Pixar was simultaneously one of the most thrilling and scary days of my life. I had not written for animation before — I was walking into a process that I knew nothing about. I was intimidated by the great storytellers working at Pixar (in every department).

description: God Bless Birth Control: The IUD Is Effective, Practical And a Slap In the Face of Puritanism | Playboy
extended: “Imagine,” my religious-education teacher said one Wednesday evening, her eyes glazing over lustily, “if every time you had intercourse, you were giving yourself over entirely to your spouse, holding nothing back.” I was 16. I could not imagine anything so unsettlingly submissive.

description: The Road To Yeezy: Mapping Kanye's Fashion Universe
Black Lives Matter movement refuses to endorse any 2016 presidential candidate | US news | The Guardian
extended: The Black Lives Matter network will not give a presidential endorsement and will instead keep up its political activism by confronting candidates about the treatment of African Americans in the US, one of the group’s founders says.
